Ivy

Features

  • Cross platform
    • Windows
    • macOS
    • Linux
  • Ebook file formats:
    • EPUB
  • Multiple libraries
  • View and edit (Calibre-compatible) metadata:
    • Author
    • Title
    • Series
    • Series number
    • Year
    • Type
    • Description
    • Cover image
  • Open book in Calibre
  • Update cover image
    • Drag and drop from file manager, web browser, etc.
    • Browse for a local file
    • One-click Google and Bing image search
  • Plugins
    • Libgen downloader
    • OpenLibrary metadata
    • Google Books metadata

Screenshots

Source

Ivy is written in C#. The source code is available on GitHub.
